name: SaltLakeCityAirQuality
0:
”Alexa, ask SLC Air Quality about current conditions”
”Alexa, ask SLC Air Quality about air quality in Salt Lake”
”Alexa, ask SLC Air Quality if the air is good”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: s. l. c. air quality
des:
If you live in Salt Lake City, you know winter air conditions can be very harmful to your health. Be smart about your outside air exposure. Use SLC Air Quality to get the current air conditions for Salt Lake City, Utah.

To get air conditions, you can say "Alexa, please ask SLC Air Quality about current conditions" or "Alexa, ask SLC air quality if the air is good".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
